column9: Haven't been at eddison for a while. Their quality is still ok but also the most expensive lunch around. I think it is still worth it and the other restaurants are raising the price without adapting quality. Just a word of warning, this concept will...More

column7: If in Ideon, A Good Choice
column9: Located in Ideon industrial park.  If your working in that area, a good choice. It is self-serve/cafeteria style and there are 3 choices. A veg/gluten free, a main and a stew. Tried reindeer for the first time!  Salad bar as well with local ingredients.  Overall...More

I eat here when the restaurant at my job-place is closed during the summer or in some other occasions.
They are good at cooking meat, but I find everything else quite mediocre (especially italian and asian food). Sometimes  I find it the stuff too dry...More

Easily the best lunch option near Ideon, comfortable walk from Sony or from Baxter.  Salad bar is good, and there's a choice between three different mains - vegetarian, traditional and international.  Only down side is due to it's popularity it can sometimes be a little...More

Quite good place for a work lunch break, relaxing atmosphere and good (but limited) choice of food.
Maybe too much spices and flavor surrounding every type of food.

This lunch restaurant is probably the best it the area. You always have 3 options to choose from, of which all have good quality ingredients. It's a bit pricey perhaps, but you'll usually leave this place feeling very satisfied.

Helt ok lunch.
